articles.title: CHEST releases new clinical guidelines to improve diagnosis of hypersensitivity pneumonitis - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: The American College of Chest Physicians recently released new clinical guidelines on the Diagnosis and Evaluation of Hypersensitivity Pneumonitis (HP).

articles.title: Biden Has 63 Percent Approval Rating, AP Poll Finds - The New York Times
articles.description: Sixty-three percent of Americans said they approved of the work Biden was doing as president, while just 36 percent disapproved.

articles.title: China Defends Handling of Rocket That Fell to Earth - Asharq Al-awsat - English
articles.description:
China´s government defended its handling of a rocket booster that burned up over the Indian Ocean and said Monday it was unfairly being held to different standards than the U.S. and other space programs.
